game_description: Neon Kite is a VR Arcade Kiteboarding Game inspired by the Synthwave genre. There are 4 game modes available so far: Tutorial: Learn the basics. Chill: Free Play mode with no goal. Arcade: Hit the goals with the matching color of the board. Survival: Don't get eaten... Enable Pro Mode for more realistic control. Music: ESCP - https://escp-music.bandcamp.com Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ And Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio More details on https://www.neonkitevr.com/music ** Neon Kite may contain flashing imagery. Use the "Light Mode" at the beginning of the game for the same experience without flashes. ** This game is still in development and the upcoming updates are included. Your support is greatly appreciated!
